title: [Murk Manor]
description: Gritty grey stone walls, several sporting clusters of barnacles along the edges, make up the spacious entryway, which is graced with a crookedly hung painting.  A healthy handful of dark-glassed lanterns are scattered around the room, most on the ground, though several make their homes atop water-stained wooden side tables, the only furniture in sight.  Its pristine condition strikingly out of place in the dour surroundings, a wide white marble cart streaked with grey holds a collection of vials and other sundries.

Gritty grey stone walls, several sporting clusters of barnacles along the edges, make up the spacious entryway, which is graced with a crookedly hung painting.  A healthy handful of dark-glassed lanterns are scattered around the room, most on the ground, though several make their homes atop slipshod wooden side tables, the only furniture in sight.  Its pristine condition strikingly out of place in the dour surroundings, a wide white marble cart streaked with grey holds a collection of vials and other sundries.
